mapper.select: select member_no as memberNo ,member_id as memberId ,member_name as memberName ,phone as phone ,birthday as birthDay ,addr as addr ,enrolldate as enrollDate from (select rownum as rnum ,m.* from (select * from member where member_code = 0 where member_code = 1 order by enrolldate desc)m) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from member where member_code=0where member_code=1
